mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scseatTBL(seatNo, userId, ticketName, selectedDate, startTime, TEMPUSINGNO, endTime ) VALUES(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4},#{param5},TEMPUN_seq.nextval,#{param6})
mapper.select: select * from scseatTBL order by tempUsingNo desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBSCRIPTIONTBL(sticketNo, sticketName, sticketId, sremainTime) VALUES (STICKET_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
